bogblossom_petal.name: Bogblossom Petal
bogblossom_petal.description: Used to craft Antidote Herbs. A swamp flower with natural toxin-eating properties.

frostroot_chunk.name: Frostroot Chunk
frostroot_chunk.description: Used to craft Coolroot Gel. A cold cavern root known for its burn-soothing qualities.

embershard_fragment.name: Embershard Fragment
embershard_fragment.description: Used to craft Warmth Charms. A mineral shard that emits soft natural heat.

bloodvine_fiber.name: Bloodvine Fiber
bloodvine_fiber.description: Used to craft Coagulant Bandages. Fibers from a plant that magically clots wounds.

voltslate_pebble.name: Voltslate Pebble
voltslate_pebble.description: Used to craft Grounding Stones. A stone that naturally absorbs electrical charge.

mindglass_shard.name: Mindglass Shard
mindglass_shard.description: Used to craft Clarity Droplets. A crystal that resonates with mental focus.

glowcap_mushroom.name: Glowcap Mushroom
glowcap_mushroom.description: Used to craft Glowcap Salve. A bioluminescent mushroom that restores magical sight.

rousepepper_seeds.name: Rousepepper Seeds
rousepepper_seeds.description: Used to craft Awakening Spice. Hot seeds that snap the senses awake.
